1.content: You are a busy 18 year old getting ready for college. you are packing all your books, pens, laptop, and o-ya your iPod in your parents truck to go to the doorm room on campus, when you find a toy your pet dragon has been look for for ages. Your dragon is just sun bathing on the shelf for the window. You also remember that it's been a while sence you sat down and cared for your dragon.
1.title: Starting

11.content: And what is your dragon?
11.title: Are you a boy

choices: He is going to take you to his homeland
111.content:
You are lying on your bed when you see something in front of you.
You realize it is your old dragon but he is bigger than you.
Suddenly he grips you close to him using his claws.
When you look at him you notice loneliness in his eyes.
You then ask what he wants to do.
He then makes a gesture showing him holding, playing, and cuddling with you.
"I get it, you want me to spend time with you." you say.
He nods, then goes outside.
He then spreads his wings and puts you on his back.
111.title: Boy

1112.content:
You hold on to his horns as he lifts off.
You look down and see houses where forests once stood.
You look at you dragon and he gives you a look of worry.
"What's wrong?" you ask.
Suddenly, it speaks and it has the voice of a male.
"This used to be part of my grounds, until your race destroyed it and built your homes on it." he says.
"I-I never knew." you said.
"Come on, I'll take you to my cave." he said.
Soon you reach a cave in a mountain.
"This is my home." he said.
He lets you off and nudges you.
"Take off your clothes." he says.
"This is a bit sudden, but ok." you say.
You take off all your clothes including your underwear.
"Ok, now what." you say.
Your dragon sets you facedown on his lap, then all of a sudden....SMACK, you feel a stinging sensation on your butt and then you realize he is spanking you.
"Ow, Ow, Ow." you cry in pain.
"You neglected me for years, now you are getting your punishment." your dragon says.
"I'm sorry." you say in tears, "I didn't mean to neglect you, I sort of just forgot about you." you say.
"Hmmph." your dragon says not believing you.
Suddenly, you smell smoke and see something burning upon closer inspection, you see your dragon has burned your clothes to cinders.
"What did you do that for?" you yell angrily.
He flips you upright, so your bare butt is now on his lap.
"Listen to me, you now belong to me, and you are never going to see your race again until I say, AM I CLEAR?" he responds.
"yes." you say.
"Good, now be a good human and give me a hug." he says.
You hug your dragon's red scaley chest.
"Now I need to mark you." he says.
"Your not gonna mark me with you piss or poop, are you?" you ask frightfully.
"No, I have a different idea in mind." he says.
You see he has an unknown mineral in his hand.
"This here is Dragnamium, a special mineral only us dragons know about." he says.
He then makes a fire mark near your eyes, then for your chest, he makes the sign of a dragon, then for your legs, he makes the same tribal markings as he has on his forehead. He then marks your back, arms, and shoulders with the Dragnamium.
"There, you're all marked." he says.
"What did you do?" you ask.
I marked you with my clan's markings, though all clan members have different markings." he says.
"Wow, that's incredible." he says.
He then blows fire to make a campfire.
"That should keep you warm." he says.
"Eat what you like now, because next week, you'll start having cravings for human flesh." he says.
"Human flesh, Isn't that cannibalism?" you ask.
"You could say that." he replies.
He shares his killed bear with you.
"Here, you need your strength." he says.
"Thanks." you say.
You take a bite out of the meat and realize it tasted just like chicken.
"Hey, this is not half bad." you say.
Your dragon just chuckles at your remark.
You look outside and see the sun setting.
Your dragon sits with you and watches.
"Oh, and I forgot to tell you, those marks are permanent." he says.
"That's ok." you say.
He wraps his claw around your back.
"This is one of the most beautiful sunsets ever." you say.
"Yeah." he says.
You look into his red eyes, and he looks into your brown eyes.
The two of you realize this may be the new start of the bond between you two.
When the sun finally disappears, the two of you go back into the cave.
Your dragon blows a small patch of fire to warm you up.
"Thanks." you say.
"Alright, time for bed." he says.
He places you near his stomach and curls up, guarding you as the both of you fall asleep.

Soon you felt tired and you let yourself sleep... nap with your dragoness.

1123.content:
Suddenly the dragon turns around and looks at you, your eyes lock with hers and suddenly everything goes white.

You wake up and find yourself staring into bright blue eyes. Surprised, you get up and look at the creature staring at you. It's a large, white dragon, with two horns on its head and a long tail with one spike on the end. Wait.. it couldn't be... Your dragon was only a bit bigger than a hamster, this one is twice your size!

You look around you and realize that everything in the room around you is huge - you must have shrunk! You look in front of you again and realize that the dragon is gone. A loud squeak causes you to turn around and see that your dragon is gnawing on the rubber toy that you just found. It notices you watching it and drops the toy. It then...

1212.content:
You pick yourself up off the ground and recall what happened. A flash of reflected sunlight, everything was spinning.... then black. You shake your head and look upwards, you almost fell backwards in surprise. Large reptilian eyes peered into yours with an amused look. You step backwards, a bit startled, and realize that it was your dragon - but huge! The head of the reptile was at least twice your size!

He is grinning a bit maliciously, which unnerves you a bit. You stagger back a bit more and put your hands up, "Nice dragon.. please don't hurt me," you mutter a bit awkwardly. The dragon grunts a few times, it almost seems like he's laughing. What does he want with you?
1212.title: Your room with your dragon.
